title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The issue is related to an inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap. Currently, there are multiple redraws occurring instead of only one redraw for each visible line. This issue can be reproduced by following the steps below:
OB: Currently, there are multiple redraws occurring instead of only one redraw for each visible line.
EB: This issue should be fixed and there should be at a maximum only one redraw for each visible line.
SR: To reproduce the issue, please add the following line to the StyledText performPaint method: System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
